```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
spotify2023_df = 
  read_csv("data/spotify-2023.csv") |> 
  janitor::clean_names() |> 
  rename_with(~ gsub("_percent", "", .), contains("_percent")) |> 
  rename(artist = artist_s_name)

view(spotify2023_df)
```

```{r}
plot1_df <- spotify2023_df |> 
  count(bpm) |> 
  arrange(bpm) |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = bpm, y = n, fill = bpm)) +
  geom_col(color = "black", size = 0.3) + 
  scale_fill_viridis_c(option = "magma") +
  labs(
    title = "Distribution of Songs by BPM",
    x = "BPM (Beats Per Minute)",
    y = "Number of Songs",
    fill = "BPM"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()

plot1 <- ggplotly(plot1_df)

plot1
```
